title: Oil bosses expect market surplus to shrink over time
Gunvor Chief Says Oil Oversupply Is Finally Taking Shape
summary: An oil surplus long prophesied by traders may finally be materializing, according to Gunvor Group CEO Torbjörn Törnqvist, who says the market is shifting from tightness to glut—though not everyone is buying the narrative just yet. “It looks like we are now moving into a bit of a different market,” …

title: DOJ seizes $15 billion in bitcoin from massive 'pig butchering' scam based in Cambodia
summary: An indictment says forced-labor compounds ran cryptocurrency investment fraud schemes that stole billions of dollars from victims in the U.S. and elsewhere.

title: Supply Shocks and Solar Shifts Drive Copper Prices Higher
summary: The Copper Monthly Metals Index (MMI) broke above range, with a 3.7% rise from September to October. This comes as copper prices, along with many other metals, continue to show an upside bias. title: Oil tumbles to five-month low on report of ‘large surplus’

title: Goldman, JPMorgan and Citi CEOs warn on markets reaching bubble territory
Oil Market Braces for Contango and Shale Slowdown
summary: The prospect of a contango is casting a shadow over oil markets, with the entire 2026 WTI futures curve now trading below $60 per barrel—beneath breakeven levels for most new shale wells. title: Australian Mining Stocks Rise As Trump Eyes Rare Earth Projects
summary: Australia-based companies with plans to advance rare earths projects in the United States saw their stocks soar on Tuesday as the Trump Administration continues to seek small equity stakes in critical minerals projects on American soil.
